wikitext.*:
'''Hans Jürgen Kürsch''', better known as Hansi Kürsch (born [[10 August|August 10]], [[1966]] in Lank-Latum, Germany) is a German musician, the lead vocalist and lyricist of the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-inspired power metal band [[Blind Guardian]]. Together with André Olbrich, he is also the principal songwriter for the band.
